main event: A bright bluish flash and several bright blue flashes were observed, followed by a bright reddish object that seemed like a shooting star, giving a burst of flame and then becoming a shorter star.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 10 seconds to 2-3 seconds.
The object exhibited multiple color changes, from bright bluish to bright reddish.
The object exhibited a burst of flame before becoming a shorter star.
The report states that every detail in the description suggests the object was astronomical in nature.
The report includes multiple observations of similar objects over a period of time in the Lexington, Kentucky area.
sighted object: Bright bluish flash, bright blue flashes, bright reddish object
